bug.author: Peng-wei-Yu
bug.summary: How to specify the training batch_size?
bug.description: When I train a StructuredDataClassifier model, I want to specify the training batch_size of input, should I specify the batch_size in fit function? I have try in fit function, but it seems not help.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Peng-wei-Yu>@Peng-wei-Yu</denchmark-link> Yes, that should be the correct way. How did you tell that the batch_size in fit not working?
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
